ModMetaData.name: [NEO] RimNauts
ModMetaData.author: nolabritt, RadZerp, Sophist88
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds Near-Earth Objects like moons, asteroids and space debris. Everything is visible and animated as an orbit on the world map mode. The moon is a playable biome that you need to discover and travel to using a rocket.
[b]Credits:[/b]
C#: - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198032541893/myworkshopfiles/]Nolabritt[/url]
2D art / Sprites: - [url=https://ko-fi.com/kasmex]Kasmex[/url] - Genome-X
